Name: New York Mysteries: Secrets of the Mafia
About the game: New York, 1955. It's become dangerous in the city. The mafia is trying to seize power. But recently, a new force appeared. A far more terrible force. Over the last few days, five mafia bosses have disappeared in mysterious circumstances. A strange liquid and a butterfly were found at the scenes of the disappearances. But this isn't what scared the citizens... Children started to disappear in the city. All of them drew exactly the same butterflies before they disappeared. This forced detectives and journalists alike to start their investigations. • A bonus chapter in the underground city. • An integrated strategy guide. • Collections, morphing objects, trophies, and bonus puzzles. • Wallpapers, concept art, soundtracks and much more.
